title: AR-Based Biomechanical Knee Load Analysis Simulation Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of biomechanics and human anatomy
context.additional_context: AR Simulation Training for Medical Device Professionals: Enhancing Knee Load Analysis Competency via Volleyball Court Visual Elements in Real-World Exercise Scenarios

learning_goals: Enhanced ability to interpret knee moment and patellar tendon load measurement data during three types of jump movements (drop landing, hop jump, spike jump) in AR simulation environments.
Acquired competency in analyzing biomechanical similarities between simulation results and real-world exercise environments.
Conducting a project to design and validate clinical assessment protocols using AR technology.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
